question: Question_01_(c)
statement:
Consider the matrix $\displaystyle A$ and column vector
$\displaystyle \vec{b}$.

$\displaystyle A = \begin{bmatrix} 
1 & 1 & 1 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 \\ 2 & 3 & 4
\end{bmatrix}$ and $\displaystyle \vec{b} = \begin{bmatrix} 
1 \\ 2 \\ 3
\end{bmatrix}$

Solve the two triangular systems to find all $\displaystyle \vec{x}$
such that $\displaystyle A\vec{x} = \vec{b}$
